segments.text: You bet it is . And we got four thousand for our car space ! Awesome !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's play some music ! I feel like dancing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's just what was running through my mind . Moonlight and dancing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ahh ! Now that's more like it . Atmosphere !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oops ! It's the landlord . I guess the tables have turned now . We're the noisy neighbors . Turn it down !
segments.speaker: S2
